title: btt22 0.0.0.9000
text: Automatic loading unloading ussie repo. (#3) Added .onLoad(), .unLoad() functions ussie repo placed temporary directory. Currently, package downloads ussie repo GitHub time loads; ussie branches stable, can include ussie.tar.gz inst folder package. Added internal function path_repo(), returns (temporary) path ussie repo user’s temp directory. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
